sn34.41-45:1.3: samādhismiṃ gocarakusalo hoti, na samādhismiṃ ārammaṇakusalo …
sn34.41-45:1.4: neva samādhismiṃ ārammaṇakusalo hoti, na ca samādhismiṃ gocarakusalo …
sn34.41-45:1.5: samādhismiṃ ārammaṇakusalo ca hoti, samādhismiṃ gocarakusalo ca.
sn34.41-45:1.9: (Purimamūlakāni viya yāva pañcacattālīsamā ārammaṇamūlakasappāyakārīsuttā pañca suttāni pūretabbāni.)
